entries.description: Add support for configuring IPFamilies and IPFamilyPolicy for nodeport-proxy.
vSphere: Add support for configuring multiple networks.
VMware Cloud Director: add support for configuring placement and sizing policy for machines.
Update Cilium CNI to 1.13.4, marking 1.13.0 as deprecated but kept 1.13.3 because 1.13.4 breaks IPSec support.
Hetzner CSI: recreate CSIDriver to allow upgrade from 1.6.0 to 2.2.0.
Fix a bug where project scope endpoints for GCP were working only with the presets instead of one of presets or credentials.
OpenStack: Fix project and projectID header propagation for project scoped endpoints.
